namuth liwimata patan gatha yuththe kothanin dayi nodanimi.mandayath thawamath ma mage jiwithaye ayithikaruwada,bharakaruwada parshawakaruwek pamanakda yanna thawamath nodanna bawini.ada wana wita mama jiwithaya gana therum ganimin sitimi..samahara wita ema therum ganima niwaradi wiya haka.bohowita oba siyalla awasana methek thiranaya kala paridi eya waradi wiya haka.kuda kala sita ma mata wuwamana kala de boho wethath athara pramukha wu ekama deya nam ma menma sithiya haki soyureki.mata wada wadi mahalu soyureki..bala soyurek misa wadimahal soyurek gena eemata mage mawupiyan apohosath bawa ewaka mata nowatahini.
bandaranayaka mathithumage kalaye wadawarna harasiya ganak thibuna.

sankhya lekhana anshaye sewawanrajaye sewakayansewaka parshawaya nawa liyapadinchi kirim saha nawatha liyapadinchi kirima.pudgalika sewakayinsewaka parshawaya nawa liyapadinchi kirim saha nawatha liyapadinchi kirima.“kalapiya rakiraksha sewa eekaka” haraha rakiya wetha yomu kirima.wiwidha wargaye apakara labadimarakiya awastha“kalapiya rakiraksha sewa eekaka” haraha rakiya wetha yomu kirima.“margagatha rakiya bankuwa” haraha rakiya wetha yomu kirima.nawikayan liyapadinchi kirimasapayumkaruweku wimatanawikayin sewayen midawima nawikayin sewaye yedawima.widesha rakiyakoriyawa sandaha wigamanika shramikayin puhunu kirima ha sahathika kirima.gruha sewaka ha juki kriyakaruwan puhunu kirima ha sahathika kirima.purappadu ha niyojithayan liyapadinchi kirima sadaha anumathiya labadimashishyathwa laba ganima.niwasa naya laba ganima.widesha niyojitha aayathanayanhi balapathra aluth kirima.swayan rakiya naya laba ganima.waidya sayanayakata sahabhagi wima.wgamanika shramikaya guwan thotupalehidi sahaya laba ganima.sankramanika shramikayan sandaha rakshana oppu laba ganima.wideshagatha wimata pera dena naya laba ganima.nithi sewawan laba ganima.
